channel.title: CVE Feed for BurgerThemes -- CoziPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BurgerThemes -- CoziPress

item.title: CVE-2024-38786|2024-07-22T15:46:33.659Z -- burgerthemes -- cozipress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BurgerThemes CoziPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CoziPress: from n/a through 1.0.30.
